name: Mint-X Window Frame
description: This userstyle is designed to emulate the Mint-X gtk theme for Linux Mint when using the "Hide Caption Titlebar Plus" Firefox extension to remove the titlebar.
additional_info:
The style is very complete, and covers focused and unfocused windows, maximized and unmaximized windows, but it is not perfect.

Known Issues:
1. No window shadow
2. Slow window frame updates
3. Rounded window borders create small artifacts

This style is designed to be used with the "Hide Caption Titlebar Plus" extension and australis UI. The settings that should be used for "Hide Caption Titlebar Plus" can be seen in the screenshots.

A Firefox theme needs to be active for this to work, it overrides the theme.

Version 1.0
